recipesJson.name: TOC'S Apple Pie Juice
recipesJson.author: TOCMichelleHughes
recipesJson.description: Country Apple/Fuji serve as the apple in this pie. Cookie FA/Cookie FLV serve as our crust. The creamy filling comes from Vanilla pudding and whipped cream. Eggnog is serving as our spice (I can't vape cinnamon so if you can feel free to replace this with a low percent of your favorite cinnamon). Super Sweet to make it sweet ...
